name: @pokecode/cli
description: PokéCode CLI tool for running local development servers
author: Just Because Labs

scripts.build: bun run build:bundle && bun run build:types
scripts.build:bundle: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --minify --splitting && bun build src/server-entry.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --minify --external react --external react-dom
scripts.lint: bun run typecheck && echo '✅ @pokecode/cli: TypeScript checks passed'
scripts.prepare:publish: bun run build && bun run bundle-deps && cp package.production.json package.json
scripts.prepare:dev: cp package.dev.json package.json || echo 'No dev package.json found'
scripts.test:global: bun run pack && npm install -g pokecode-*.tgz
